ygData.subject: A recent group I was in
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! I wanted to take a moment and tell you about the recent experience I had in a group over in Lavastorm Mountains. I was just hanging out over there
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone!

I wanted to take a moment and tell you about the recent experience I had in a group over in Lavastorm Mountains.

I was just hanging out over there in the entrance to Najena hunting Fire Drakes and such outside. It was good leveling and they dropped some decent coin for a lower level player. Well I havened to meet up with two Dark Elves from Germany. one spoke no english but the other was able to translate for her. They asked me to join their group and I did. I have to say that was one of the funnest groups I have ever been in! I'm kind of a communications buff so it was very fun for me to watch and read the chat between them. It was also a good opportunity for me to maybe pick up a few new words!

C-ya!
Durgaa
Shizney
Genmay

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Steven R. Hulse
Durgaa: Lvl15 FWE Ranger member of Causality Guild
Genmay: lvl15 Warrior Member of Causality
Shizney: Lvl16 Magician Member of Causality
